img_above_text:
![Wukong MindCliff 6.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/fe/Wukong_MindCliff_6.jpg)
If you spot him twirl his blade up behind him, be ready for a quick dash forward as he slashes upward, and then slams down to create a trail of ice in front of him. Thankfully, unlike some of the other moves, this will lead him wide open if you dodge to his side and strike back.
img_below_text:
Finally, he can also simply hang back and toss two poison-coated daggers your way in a quick throw, requiring good reaction time to evade.
Note that if you try to press your attack while he's in an idle or defensive posture, he'll eventually deflect your combo with a louder block noise, and then retaliate -- but you can beat him at his own game by deflecting after his deflection.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong MindCliff 6.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/fe/Wukong_MindCliff_6.jpg)
If you spot him twirl his blade up behind him, be ready for a quick dash forward as he slashes upward, and then slams down to create a trail of ice in front of him. Thankfully, unlike some of the other moves, this will lead him wide open if you dodge to his side and strike back."
        - Following Text: "Finally, he can also simply hang back and toss two poison-coated daggers your way in a quick throw, requiring good reaction time to evade.
Note that if you try to press your attack while he's in an idle or defensive posture, he'll eventually deflect your combo with a louder block noise, and then retaliate -- but you can beat him at his own game by deflecting after his deflection."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a combat encounter from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. The player character is engaged in a fight against an enemy named "Non-White" in a rocky, open area with intricate stonework. The preceding and following text describe the enemy's attack patterns, including blade slashes, ice trails, poison dagger throws, and defensive maneuvers. The image serves to visually represent the gameplay mechanics and strategies required to counter the enemy's moves effectively.
